autoupdate.script: ALTER TABLE `article` ADD `order` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `article` ADD `visible` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '2';

CREATE TABLE `article_label` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , `name` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
CREATE TABLE `article_line_label` (`line_id` INT NOT NULL , `label_id` INT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `article_label` ADD `url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL;
CREATE TABLE `article_attached_label` (`article_id` INT NOT NULL , `label_id` INT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `w_sport_player` DROP PRIMARY KEY, ADD PRIMARY KEY(`id`, `position`, `season`, `team`);
ALTER TABLE `w_sport_stats` ADD `pos` INT NOT NULL AFTER `pid`;
ALTER TABLE `w_sport_stats` DROP PRIMARY KEY, ADD PRIMARY KEY(`pid`, `pos`, `mid`, `season`, `table_id`);
